channel.title: Need help with Wallpaper - free copy of my book to person who helps
channel.description:
Hi guys
I have been trying without success to get a screenshot of the Crowbar Collective screen that appears for a split second when BM loads - I think this is a stunning image and wanted to use it for wallpaper on my system. Does anyone know how I could do this? I need a 1900x1200 or bigger.
*Edit* For the person who helps I will send a free copy of [b]The Panther Project Vol 1: Drivetrain and Hull[/b] found here [url]https://www.theresearchsquad.com/index.php/books/[/url]
